    • deleteAcl

      public boolean deleteAcl(long id) throws AclServiceException, org.opencastproject.util.NotFoundException
      Description copied from interface: AclService
      Delete an ACL by its ID.
      Specified by:
      deleteAcl in interface AclService
      Returns:
      true if the ACL existed and could be deleted successfully, false if the ACL can't be deleted because it still has active references on it.
      Throws:
      AclServiceException - if exception occurred
      org.opencastproject.util.NotFoundException - if the managed acl could not be found
